pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Okabe-Ito' Scales for 'ggplot2' and 'ggraph' // Discrete scales for the colorblind-friendly 'Okabe-Ito' palette, including 'color', 'fill', and 'edge_colour'. 'ggokabeito' provides 'ggplot2' and 'ggraph' scales to easily use the 'Okabe-Ito' palette in your data visualizations.
